name: Rescue the light
description:
[A & D] - move left and right
[Space] - jump

A platformer without vision (well, you need to kill to see)

Jump on top of enemies to kill them. Enemies release light when they die. Use that light to navigate through the level to the exit.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2018 by a team of 2 students.
It is our first game and we hope you enjoy playing it.
